dual

(
  • v
)
MutableSpinorE3 chainable

Defined in src/davinci-eight/math/MutableSpinorE3.ts:215

this ⟼ dual(v) = I * v

Notice that the dual of a vector is related to the spinor by the right-hand rule.

Parameters:

  • v VectorE3

    The vector whose dual will be used to set this spinor.

Returns:

MutableSpinorE3:

this

reflect

(
  • n
)
MutableSpinorE3 chainable

Defined in src/davinci-eight/math/MutableSpinorE3.ts:445

Sets this Spinor to the value of its reflection in the plane orthogonal to n. The geometric formula for bivector reflection is B' = n * B * n.

Parameters:

  • n VectorE3

Returns:

MutableSpinorE3:

this

rotor

(
  • b
  • a
)
MutableSpinorE3 chainable

Defined in src/davinci-eight/math/MutableSpinorE3.ts:482

Computes a rotor, R, from two unit vectors, where R = (1 + b * a) / sqrt(2 * (1 + b << a))

Parameters:

  • b VectorE3

    The ending unit vector

  • a VectorE3

    The starting unit vector

Returns:

MutableSpinorE3:

this The rotor representing a rotation from a to b.
